# BOOTia32.efi ![:inline](/images/twitter_verified.png) 


### Description

This was provided by whitecanyon and revoked Jul-20
- **UUID**: 2b96f3c6-afdb-4da2-84d4-601c9a71b2a8
- **Created**: 2023-05-22
- **Author**: Michael Haag
- **Acknowledgement**:  | [](https://twitter.com/)

{{< button "https://github.com/magicsword-io/LOLbootloaders/raw/main/bootloaders/69a56b18be5865ccda9ab3a5bb4987ab.bin" "Download" >}}
{{< tip "warning" >}}

{{< /tip >}}

### Commands

```
bcdedit /copy &#34;{current}&#34; /d &#34;LOLDrivers&#34; | {% if ($_ -match &#39;{\S+}&#39;) { bcdedit /set $matches[0] path \windows\temp\BOOTia32.efi } }
```


| Use Case | Privileges | Operating System | 
|:---- | ---- | ---- |
| Persistence |  | 32-bit |
